column4: I just fresh installed 9.10 on my server and now (I have a monitor connected) I can't connect to my wireless network...
well, whats your wireless device, and second, why are you using 9.10?

I need 9.10 for my computer because that's the only verion supported by the maker of the computer (I need it for video acceleration) the wireless device is intneral.  I don't even know how to check which drivers are installed and working
lspci in a terminal should show your wireless device
